comment.author: Conner
comment.text: This is the guy. Lol...this is the guy u people want to win....lol ok. I guess we no longer care about our relations with other countries. Or u kno, a president thats not a complete douchey childish, self obssessed dick head

replies.text: thank u for that sarcasm, lol. Ill take it in stride

replies.author: Madeleine
replies.text: I care about the lives of Americans and our country. Do you think Mexico really cares about America? America first

replies.author: Katherine
replies.text: Relax walls he is making a Pokemon go joke. Which is painfully accurate at that. Considering how popular the game is currently it is a pretty clever and efficient way to bring people to light on how corrupt Hillary is.
